item.title: Application Menu Shortcut KDE
item.description: Option 1: GUI Right click on the app launcher and select Edit Applications from the menu. This should launch a menu editor. Make the desired edits and save them. Option 2: Terminal The menu applications are stored in /usr/share/applications/. If you want to make an edit to an existing application, edit the file: application_NAME.desktop. You can search for it using: ls | grep 'search_term'.[^ripgep] Don’t forget to use sudo for editing the file.
